snippet: Mikhail S. Gorbachev, who contended that President Vladimir V. Putin had adopted “a ruinous and hopeless path,” was denounced by members of Mr. Putin’s party.
abstract: Mikhail S Gorbachev, first and last president of Soviet Union, delivers fierce attack on Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin and his administration in speech at state-run RIA-Novosti news agency; calls for another renewal of the Russian political system.
lead_paragraph: Mikhail S. Gorbachev, who contended that President Vladimir V. Putin had adopted “a ruinous and hopeless path,” was denounced by members of Mr. Putin’s party.

headline.seo: Gorbachev Attacks Putin and His Restrictions
headline.main: An Ailing Gorbachev Makes a Fierce Attack on Putin and His Restrictions
headline.print_headline: An Ailing Gorbachev Makes a Fierce Attack on Putin and His Restrictions
